Verses: 1 koththirangalin Naamangalaavana: Vadamunaithuvakki Aamaaththukkuppogira Edhlon Vazhiyin Oraththukkum, Aadhsaarenaanukkum Aamaaththaruge Vadakkeyirukkira Thamaskuvin Ellaikkum Ullaagak Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Thaanukku Oru Pangum,
2 thaanin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Aaserukku Oru Pangum,
3 aaserin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Napthalikku Oru Pangum,
4 napthaliyin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Manaasekku Oru Pangum,
5 manaaseyin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Eppiraayeemukku Oru Pangum,
6 eppiraayeemin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Roobanukku Oru Pangum,
7 roobanin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Yoodhaavukku Oru Pangum Undaavadhaaga.

8 yoodhaavin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Neengal Arppidhamaakkavendiya Pangu Irukkum; Adhu, Irubaththaiyaayirankol Agalamum, Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Irukkira Pangugalil Ovvondrukkum Sariyaana Neelamumaam; Parisuththa Sthalam Adhin Naduvile Iruppadhaaga.
9 idhile Karththarukku Neengal Arppidhamaakkavendiya Pangu Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum, Padhinaayirankol Agalamumaayiruppadhaaga.

10 vadakke Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum, Merke Padhinaayirankol Agalamum, Kizhakke Padhinaayirankol Agalamum, Therke Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamumaagiya Indhap Parisuththa Arppidhanilamaanadhu Aasaariyarudaiyadhaayirukkum; Karththarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalam Adhin Naduvile Iruppadhaaga.

11 isravel Puththirar Vazhithappippogaiyil, Leviyar Vazhithappipponadhupola Vazhithappippogaamal, En Kaavalaik Kaaththukkonda Saadhokkin Puththiraraagiya Parisuththamaakkappatta Aasaariyargalukku Adhu Uriyadhaagum.
12 appadiye Dhesaththil Arppidhamaakkappadugiradhile Magaa Parisuththamaana Pangu Avargalukku Leviyarudaiya Ellaiyaruge Iruppadhaaga.

13 aasaariyarin Ellaikku Edhiraaga Leviyar Adaiyum Pangu Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum, Padhinaayirankol Agalamumaayirukkavendum; Neelam Irubaththaiyaayirankolum, Agalam Padhinaayirankolumaayiruppadhaaga.
14 avargal Adhil Ondraiyum Virkavum Dhesaththin Mudhal Vilaivai Maatravum Matravargalukkuk Kodukkavum Thagaadhu; Adhu Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhu.

15 irubaththaiyaayirankolukku Edhiraaga Agalaththil Meedhiyaayirukkum Aiyaayirankolovendraal, Parisuththamaayiraamal, Kudiyerum Nagaraththukkum Velinilangalukkum Vidavendum; Nagaram Adhin Naduvil Iruppadhaaga.
16 adhin Alavugalaavana: Vadapuram Naalaayiraththainnooru Kolum, Thenpuram Naalaayiraththainnooru Kolum, Keezhppuram Naalaayiraththainnoorukolum, Merpuram Naalaayiraththainnooru Kolumaam.
17 nagaraththin Velinilangal Vadakke Irunootraimbadhu Kolum Therke Irunootraimbadhu Kolum, Kizhakke Irunootraimbadhu Kolum, Merke Irunootraimbadhu Kolumaayiruppadhaaga.

18 parisuththa Arppidhanilaththukku Edhiraaga Neelaththil Meedhiyaanadhu Kizhakke Padhinaayirankolum Merke Padhinaayirankolumaam; Adhu Parisuththa Arppidhanilaththukku Edhiraayirukkum; Adhin Varumaanam Nagaraththirkaaga Oozhiyancheygiravargalukku Aagaaramaayiruppadhaaga.
19 isravelin Sagala Koththirangalilumirundhu Kurikkappatta Silar Nagaraththirkaagap Panividai Seyvaargal.
20 arppidhanilamanaiththum Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum, Irubaththaiyaayirankol Agalamumaai Irukkakkadavadhu; Pattanaththin Kaani Utpada Indhap Parisuththa Arppidhanilam Sadhuramaai Irukkavendum.

21 parisuththa Arppidhanilaththukkum Nagaraththin Kaanikkum Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilum, Arppidhanilaththinudaiya Irubaththaiyaayirankolin Munbaagak Kizhakku Ellaimattukkum, Merkile Irubaththaiyaayirankolin Munbaaga Merku Ellaimattukkum Meedhiyaayiruppadhu Adhipadhiyinudaiyadhu; Pangugalukku Edhiraanaadhu Adhipadhiyinudaidhaayiruppadhaaga; Adharku Naduvaagap Parisuththa Arppidhanilamum Aalayaththin Parisuththa Sthalamum Irukkum.
22 adhipadhiyinudaiyadharku Naduveyirukkum Leviyarin Kaanithuvakkiyum Nagaraththin Kaanithuvakkiyum, Yoodhaavin Ellaikkum Benyameenin Ellaikkum Naduveyirukkiradhu Adhipadhiyinudaiyadhu.
23 matrak Koththirangalukku Undaagum Pangugalaavana Keezhththisaithuvakki Metrisaimattum Benyameenukku Oru Pangum,
24 benyameen Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Simiyonukku Oru Pangum,
25 simiyonin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Isakkaarukku Oru Pangum,
26 isakkaarin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Sebulonukku Oru Pangum,
27 sebulonin Ellaiyaruge Keezhththisai Thuvakki Metrisaimattum Kaaththukku Oru Pangum Undaayiruppadhaaga.
28 kaaththin Ellaiyaruge Thenmoolaiyaagiya Therku Ellai, Thaamaar Thuvakki Kaadhesilulla Sandaimoottudhalin Thanneergal Mattaagavum Periya Samuththiramattaagavum Pogum.
29 sudhandharikkumpadi Idhuve Neengal Isravel Koththirangalukku Seettuppottup Pangidum Dhesam, Ivaigale Avargalin Pangugal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
30 nagaraththinindru Purappadum Vazhigalaavana: Vadapuraththile Naalaayiraththainnooru Kolaagiya Alavundaayirukkum.

31 nagaraththin Vaasalgal, Isravel Koththirangaludaiya Naamangalinpadiye Peyar Perakkadavadhu; Vadakke Roobanukku Oru Vaasal, Yoodhaavukku Oru Vaasal, Levikku Oruvaasal, Aaga Moondru Vaasalgal Iruppadhaaga.
32 keezhppuraththile Naalaayiraththainnooru Kol, Adhil Yoseppukku Oruvaasal, Benyameenukku Oru Vaasal, Thaanukku Oru Vaasal, Aaga Moondru Vaasalgal Iruppadhaaga.
33 thenpuraththile Naalaayiraththainnooru Kol, Adhil Simiyonukku Oru Vaasal Isakkaarukku Oruvaasal, Sebulonukku Oru Vaasal, Aaga Moondru Vaasalgal Iruppadhaaga.
34 merpuraththile Naalaayiraththainnooru Kol, Adhil Kaaththukku Oruvaasal, Aaserukku Oru Vaasal, Napthalikku Oru Vaasal, Aaga Moondru Vaasalgal Iruppadhaaga.
35 sutrilum Adhin Alavu Padhinennaayirankolaagum; Annaalmudhal Nagaram Yegovaa Shammaa Ennum Peyarperum.
